name: Clupp
headline: Innovative insurance solutions for underserved markets.
description: At Clupp, we offer innovative insurance solutions for underserved markets. Whether it's B2C coverage for bicycle and scooter riders in Latin America, B2B SaaS solutions empowering insurance brokers worldwide, or creating new insurance products to guarantee financing for startups in the United States—we're pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the insurance industry.

founders.name: Omar Said López Tronco, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Clupp. Actuary, CFA Charterholder, and full-stack developer. MSc in Risk Management. Winner of the Mexican Insurance Research Award (2015), and winner of the Mexican Insurance Innovation Award (2017).

founders.name: Marisol Sánchez, Founder
founders.description: I'm cofounder at Clupp and I’m the Chief Operation Officer, so I’m in charge of everything related to claims and fraud detection. I'm an expert in insurtech in Mexico. I’m the president of the Mexican Insurtech Association.

generated_description:
**Clupp: Innovative Insurance Solutions for Underserved Markets**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Mexico City, Clupp stands out in the insurance industry by focusing on underserved markets. Think about it: traditional insurance often leaves gaps, particularly for people who ride bicycles, scooters, or even those financing startups. Clupp fills those gaps with innovative solutions tailored to the specific needs of its users.

The company's mission is straightforward and impactful: deliver innovative insurance products that cater to these overlooked demographics. From automaking to personal gadgets, they've got you covered. Their offerings include insurance for cars, motorcycles, bicycles, scooters, and even smartphones and gadgets.

One of Clupp's standout features is its B2C and B2B SaaS insurance capabilities, which empower not just individuals but also insurance brokers worldwide. They’re leveraging technology to ensure everyone gets access to coverage that makes sense for them.

Clupp operates on a unique pricing model—insurance by the kilometer. This means users only pay for what they actually use, a fantastic way to reward safe driving habits. Their app facilitates easy tracking of distance traveled, which keeps things transparent and fair.

Being part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, Clupp is positioned to grow rapidly and disrupt traditional insurance paradigms. With a nimble team of 12 and a strong group partner like nan, they're poised to make waves in the industry.

If you're curious or need assistance, you can easily reach out to them via their website [Clupp.com](http://clupp.com.mx) or through their contact number at 55 9225 2185.

In summary, Clupp is not just another insurance provider; they're a forward-thinking company committed to making insurance accessible, transparent, and tailored to modern needs. Whether you’re commuting on a bike in Latin America or paving the way for a startup in the U.S., Clupp might just have the solution you didn’t know you were waiting for.
